title: Biology Phenomenon Concept Development Exploration Project

context.prior_knowledge: High school-level foundational biology knowledge and understanding of scientific inquiry methods
context.additional_context: Providing personalized feedback through analysis of learners' conceptual development paths, emphasizing concept mapping and visualization using digital tools

learning_goals: Learners can revise and develop step-by-step conceptual explanations of biological phenomena at least three times to complete a final conceptual model.
Learners can correct over 80% of logical errors in their conceptual explanations based on peer feedback.
Learners can classify their conceptual development process into at least three stages using the RMCC methodology and write an analysis report.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
